name: AppShopPolo
body:
### Welcome to APP SHOP POLO.
This is a sample mobile application project, built using phone gap and jQuery mobile.
This project we are using to build an e commerce application.

```
$ git clone https://github.com/kanthadn/AppShopPolo.git
$ cd your_repo_root/repo_name
$ phonegap serve
```

If you're using the GitHub for Mac, simply sync your repository and you'll see the new branch.

### Authors and Contributors
In 2014, kantha dn (@kanthadn) founded keen innovators team.

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with App? contact us on ikeentoinnovate@gmail.com and weâ€™ll help you sort it out.
